titles.title: A bill to modify a provision relating to adjustments of certain State apportionments for Federal highway programs, and for other purposes.
A bill to modify a provision relating to adjustments of certain State apportionments for Federal highway programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill modifies the formula that the Department of Transportation uses to apportion federal highway funds among the states for the national highway performance program, the surface transportation program, the highway safety improvement program, the congestion mitigation and air quality improvement program, and metropolitan transportation planning.
